flawed_nl_solution:
Each cm contains 10mm so 1165cm is 1165*10 = <<1165*10=11650>>11650mm
154-150 = <<154-150=4>>4 pieces of the rope are 100mm each in length
The 4 pieces have a total length of 4*100 = <<4*100=4000>>4000mm
There is a length of 11650-4000 = <<11650-4000=7650>>7650mm left
7650 mm into 150 equal pieces will give each piece as 7650/150 = <<7650/150=51>>51mm long
#### 51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 4000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
